Duration: Full Time

Description:
\n
Seeking qualified Business Systems Analyst ( SAP) with Master’s Degree or foreign equivalent in Business Admin or Engg along with 12 months of related work experience Responsible for evaluating, designing and configuring computer systems and software to meet the needs of their employer or client and work as Lead S4 HANA SAP Consultant for finance module. Perform actual data migration from source ORACLE to target S/4 HANA 2020 for the entire landscape (Sandbox, Development, Quality & Production) and helped business with data reconciliation between the two systems. Analyze, determine the root cause, recommend, and implement solutions/ fixes within Service Level Agreement (SLA) timeframe and facilitate workshops to collect business requirements and translate them to system requirements with the ability to identify gaps, issues, and work-around solutions.
\n
Travel to unanticipated client site locations within US may be required.
\n
Qualified Candidates should send their resumes to:
